name: Parallel Words on the Run!
description:
Synopsis :

Parallel Worlds on the Run! is a pixel art, endless runner game where you play as an agent travelling through parallel worlds, armed with a dimensional beam gun and jet pack. Set off to clean up the mess left behind by bugged dimensional monsters.

Keyboard Controls:

Left  Mouse ClickTo shootMouseTo aimShift KeyTo switch worldsPress SpacebarTo JumpHold SpacebarTo use Jetpack

Made By:

  • Michael Kirby - Art
  • Jeroen Kornips - Programming
  • Jess Buscema - Sound

This was apart of a game jam called Pixel Art Game Jam, where we were tasked to make a game using only pixel art as the main art style and use the chosen theme to create gameplay around it.  The theme for this game jam was ‘Parallel Worlds’ .
